title: Phone not turning on. Showing error message, Slot Unbootable: loading Error
content:
My Google Pixel2 suddenly reboot & then stuck in screen with android logo with option "Start", "Recovery Mode", "Barcode", "Power Off" whereby all function doesn't work except for "Power Off". In the screen it indicated "ERROR: Slot Unbootable: Load Error"
I have tried all the options and it circles back to the same thing. I went to the store where I have purchased it. They advice me to contact google as it's not cover under any warranty. I
